title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 72.4 - Answer to petition not required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 72.4 - Answer to petition not required

State Regulations

All allegations of fact in the petition shall be deemed
controverted by the Commissioner of Labor, unless expressly admitted. No answer
shall be required. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
72.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
